pages.text: The Hunger is a little creature that can be found in Deserts, Red Sand Dederts or Swamp Biomes.$(br2)They will use their bodies as a camouflage to bury itself in the ground or sand in order not to be detected.$(br2)When they detect the presence of something above them, they will nimbly close their jaws in order to catch their prey.
On death the may drop Bottles o' Enchanting or Void Hearts.

If this creature makes you any damage, it will randomly remove 1 level of your enchant armor.$(br2)This creature really love to eat everything like you drop on their heads.$(br2)You can give this creature an enchanted item, like an Iron Sword with Looting 2 enchantment and then, give it a Diamond Sword without any enchantment, then it will drop the Diamond Sword with looting 2 enchantment.
